Title: Spirit Single Sign On System
Description: SpiritSSO provide solution open source Single Sign On and Authentication System in .NET. Main features is Cross-Domain Single Sign On, Multi-programing language support (Client API for ASP.NET, PHP, JAVA v...v) , Security, Distributed Clustering and customize theme of login form.

Project Description
SpiritSSO provide solution open source Single Sign On and Authentication System in .NET. Main features is Cross-Domain Single Sign On, Multi-programing language support (Client API for ASP.NET, PHP, JAVA v...v) , Security, Distributed Clustering and customize theme of login form.
